title: Some bug
body: When i acept metch , its some kinda of pause or freze on screen of lol and its like 5 sec and for those 5 sec everybody types adc,mid etc. and im stuck with jg or supp becous of that freze for 5 sec . Do you know to fix that freze , so i can type top or mid faster ?

replies.body: When you join matchmaking, the server needs to group everyone together into the same room.  It sounds like you might be having a connection issue that's having trouble transitioning over to champion select.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help strengthen your connection and help with your transition.  Hope that helps!
Its definetly not a connection issue.. its performance issue of the new client.
For some reason you sound like a genwunner.
